potions.name: Amortentia
potions.description: A very potent love potion; can be toxic in high doses

potions.name: Potent Furor Poison
potions.description: A potent poison that induces powerful and potentially dangerous feelings of anger and rage when ingested

potions.name: Elixir of Beauty
potions.description: Enhances the attractiveness of the drinkers physical appearance

potions.name: Soliservo Elixer
potions.description: When ingested, allows the user to withstand direct sunlight (intended for Vampire use only)

potions.name: Ignus Noxa
potions.description: A simple, yet highly effective damage potion. Inflicts a singing effect on the intended target, causing extreme discomfort

potions.name: Felix Felicis
potions.description: More commonly known as 'Liquid Luck'; makes the drinker lucky for a limited period of time, during which everything they attempt will be successful

potions.name: Dissolution Drought
potions.description: A malicious drought intended for use on a pair; induces strong feelings of disdain between the two targets

potions.name: Wiggenweld Potion
potions.description: A very simple, yet potent healing potion that cures a wide variety of ailments and afflictions

potions.name: Invisibility Potion
potions.description: A potion that makes the drinker invisible for a brief amount of time

potions.name: Polyjuice Potion
potions.description: A complex and time-consuming concoction, which is best left to highly skilled witches and wizards. Allows the user to assume the physical appearance of another person

potions.name: Veritaserum
potions.description: A very powerful truth serum that forces the drinker to speak the truth

potions.name: Wolfsbane Potion
potions.description: A remedy for the most debilitating symptoms of lycanthropy; allows the drinker to keep their minds during the full moon
